originalText.text: We hired Seth to initiate what would later become a contested matrimonial case in Westchester, New York.  There were a number of complexities involved considering the age of the marriage (30+ years) and more importantly a very adversarial party on the other side. Another issue we encountered was the overall process in the county court. Unlike most others, this Court requires mediation for an extensive amount of time before putting the matter on the trial calendar.  Seth filed numerous motions in order to get the case before a Judge and ardently argued each one obtaining positive results on almost every one.  Knowing the limits of our financial capabilities, he did not demand additional fees nor did he pressure us. Yet, he worked incredibly hard and was sure to attend every one of the 20+ Court appearances regardless of his heavy caseload.  Not only did he attend every appearance for 4 years, appear and facilitate all communication throughout and after mediation, and file winning motions, but he also did a trial during which he skillfully cross-examined the opposing party.  Ultimately, the decision after trial was in our favor and the Court ruled that we were entitled to everything we asked for. Seth is the most caring, honest, and passionate attorney I’ve ever met. If you are seeking an attorney who will fight wholeheartedly and go to the end of the earth for you, he is the one. Amazing lawyer…but an even better person. Thank you Seth!

originalText.text: Seth is a nice and very hardworking attorney while it may seem like pros in legal representation these are not benefits. Seth represented me in family trial as naive nervous young adult I felt reassured with Seth. He began telling how the proceedings would go, we discussed my end of the story letting him know I acted in self defense, even went over evidence material to the trial and showing the bodily harm I had. My side of the story was never told, no evidence discussed was ever submitted. I don’t know if this is a case of incompetence, being overworked or just a lack of care. Either way.. you get what you pay for.

originalText.text: Seth hands down was is super amazing I was so nervous and scared to deal with my abuser . Can I tell you Seth Schraier talk to me and was so good at getting me into a comfortable space enough and made me realize he has got this at the end he took care of my entire situation . He got me what I needed and deserved without out me asking he is freaking phenomenal he did what needed to be done I feel like I have a new life . I feel like I can breathe again he cares for his victims. He is awesome at family law listen I could sing about how awesome he is forever he gave me my life back I am forever grateful for his expertise in all he did I am so happy !!!

originalText.text: Attorney Seth Schraier has been an excellent attorney like I had never had before. It was my first time being in court, and with his help to represent me, he taught me important lessons on how to be a faithful client throughout the case. After more than two and a half long years in a case with him, it was still unfortunate that the other party decided to convince the Judge to dismiss the case without prejudice, but what I enjoyed out of him is that he shows me how the case we've been in is far from over. Before the dismissal, he fought with excellent organized and professional skills against the other party to make my case come to light. As the result, the Judge made her first half of her ruling on our favor, showing that the other party has no case all along, which really prompt the other party to concede. From this experience, I admire all the lessons he taught me, and from where it begins, all of his guidance became a part of me to be ready for anything in court. Thank you again Attorney Seth Schraier, you are the best!

originalText.text: Mr. Schraier was a wonderful attorney. We were very blindsided and needed assistance and organization which he brought with professionalism and tact. I never been in a courtroom before this case, and I was constantly anxious and having panic attacks to the point of hyperventilation. However, he helped to calm me down and was extremely patient in explaining the protocols of the court. To the point where the judge made a ruling midway through the case that was in the favor of my brother who also had a case against him and myself. While there was not a definitive judgment due to the other party deciding to drop the case, I am immensely grateful for Attorney Schraier's professionalism and guidance during this very turbulent, scary time. He was very present and I am very thankful for all he did for us.
